alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Marion; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:38AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Sedgwick, eastern Harvey, northwestern Butler and southeastern Marion Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1138 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walton to near Valley Center. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newton, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Peabody, Whitewater, Florence, Kechi, Walton, Elbing, Burns and Newton Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 14 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
